title: Cara Delevingne is pure flames in her new Nasty Gal collaboration
text:
Cara Delevingne is pure flames in her new Nasty Gal collaboration (Picture: Nasty Gal)

Cara Delevingne has just gone and dropped her Nasty Gal collaboration, and it is everything.

Yes, people, we have been served, and the goddess is pure flames in each and every outfit.

Power dressing to the max, the 27-year-old showed off her latest range with the fashion brand, and just like Pokémon, we want all the looks.

From leopard print, faux fur coats, to silk black shirts and grey tailored suits, we sure know what we’ll be putting on our Christmas wish lists.

Speaking of her 40-piece collection (yes, FOURTY-piece), the icon said: ‘I am so excited to get to join Nasty Gal in this new part of their brand journey.

‘It’s such an exciting time to be working with them.’

We have been served (Picture: Nasty Gal)

She sure knows how to power dress (Picture: Nasty Gal)

Just like Pokémon, we want all the looks (Picture: Nasty Gal)

The star went onto reveal her favourite pieces, including ‘the jeans with the cut-outs right below the bum and the crop tops,’ because, why not?

Advertisement

Advertisement

She added: ‘It’s empowering to select pieces of clothing to illustrate how you feel on the inside on any given day.’

The star launched her line in London tonight, where she was joined by her girlfriend Ashley Benson.

And the pair barely left each other’s side during the glamorous evening, as they showed off their dance moves behind the DJ booth.

The star enjoyed a launch party in London (Picture: Nasty Gal)

She’s excited for her new range (Picture: Nasty Gal)

A source at the event told Metro.co.uk: ‘Cara didn’t leave Ashley’s side even though it was her night.

‘She made sure Ashley was with her the whole time.’

‘They seem totally loved up, they only have eyes for each other,’ the insider added.

In July it was thought the supermodel and the Pretty Little Liars actress had become engaged after they were pictured wearing matching bands.

It was then later rumoured that the duo had jetted off to Las Vegas where they supposedly said their vows at the Little Chapel in August.

However, since then, it’s been said that the loved up couple are not actually legally married, and instead chose to have a ‘friendship ceremony’.

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

MORE: Lizzo and Macaulay Culkin dance (awkwardly) together on stage and it’s a pairing we’d never thought we’d see
description: Cara Delevingne is pure flames in her new Nasty Gal collaboration.
